**remindme {reminder} {duration} <#chann:
Sets a reminder that will send to the specified channel, if there isn't a channel specified then it will be sent to your DM's
**Examples:**
*remindme Do stuff 20min*
*remindme Do stuff 1day 10hr 30min #channel-name*
*r Do things 30days*
**Supported units:**
*Seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months(30days), years(365 days)*
**Note:** If sending reminder to specific channel, both you and the bot need permissions to send messages there!
**setprefix *{prefix} (alias: \"prefix\": Sets custom prefix for this server!
